post.body: - it could be matched up to the various state assessments....WOW, my kids would clamor to use the Wii for that type of review!
- wanna quit your day job??? LOL That sounds great....let's see....hmmmm...what should we include?
- Saw the Wii Ski, but didn't know if I needed any special things 2 use it besides the standard remote
- glad to hear you survived...I called EVERYWHERE 2 buy a Wii for last night but no go...they were all being delivered 2day...
- you mean you can RENT Wii games????? NEVER knew that!
- I'm looking for a Wii Fit as well. Actually that's why I bought the Wii to begin with! Daughter wants Mario Cart
- you'll LOVE the Acer.....mine game w/ 1 GB so what are you up to? 2 GB????
- how was your festivity? Did you survive?
- hair of dog occured at 8:27 a.m. LOL....party was GREAT...caterer came w/ EVERYTHING and left w/ all dirty dishes!!!
- thx.sure we will....right now I'm the only one in the house....guests start coming in an hour....enjoying the quiet n4 the storm
- DON'T drink before going to liquor store -- bad combo....but DEFINITELY drink...will help put things in perspective! LOL
- he's celebrating his 65th.....no one can believe it....looks & acts in his 40s.....I'm one lucky woman!
- I'll join you for a 'hair of the dog' 2morrow a.m., well.....LATE a.m.! LOL enjoy!
- Happy B-Day!!! Just goes to show, you need to be VERY careful what you post online! LOL
- the reason I did it (partially) was they bring it all and TAKE IT ALL AWAY (linens, plates, etc.).....little clean up WOOHOO!!!
@fsinfo @riptidef @atruger @glad2be thx 4 doing all you do and being all that you are to have made this possible
- that would have been me.....wii fit...I will continue to try contacting Best Buy every few days (they're 1 hour away)
- Quelle joyeuses nouvelles! Tante Beth.......
- Congrats on the acceptance, that's quite an honor!
- have a BLASTand stay safe & warm
- interested 2 know if they include the cards...I bought the book (& xtra pack of cards)...seems cards are imp 2 concept
- besides 'Pres Zen'; keep in mind 'Slide:ology' by Duarte (my current read)
- when done, plz share ur 3rd gr. pilot; I too have classes 1x week & can't seem to get done what I want 2 get done...TIA
- confused about NECC....I need to be certified to use wikis???? I mean I am 'certifiable' so does that count??? LOL more info pls
- you MUST contact @cliotech for her AWESOME Cover-It-Live blogging
- blog will focus on ALL things related to vis literacy - including reviews of websites, apps, 'tech toys' -- also 'how tos' etc
- now my interest is piqued...what honor?
- is that a trick question? If not, my response would be 'uhhhh...NEVER'! LOL
- for print at 24 bit color w/ 150 dpi it would be a size of about 990 KB
- OK, probably should stop sipping from the Jamican Rum Cream! LOL
- notice that I DID NOT use Google as a verb!
- oh.....and do I have a bridge to sell to you! ROFLMAO......I truly haven't a glue, but couldn't we search Google?
- it has something to do with the gases emitted from the wood that reacts to the steam from the pot. hope this helps!
- I would STRONGLY encourage you to belong to more than one 365 group & tagging you images as such is NOT a problem
- IF only I had the code to alter the voice recording on school phone line!~ LOL
- blogger does have a tool -- it's called twitterfeed.....go do it...very simple to set up
ok....off to eat left-overs...(champagne qualifies, right? LOL) and snuggling w/ hubby 2 watch TV then early to bed....night all!
anyone know where we can get the Wii Fit board online? amazon.com is sold out
OK....any tips for setting up the Wii before I unbox it?
on way back from taking my guests to airports I swung by & bought a Wii -- LET THE GAMES BEGIN!!!! woot
I'm supplying the drinks and the games! LOL
http://twitpic.com/u9vq - current conditions....baked a loaf of cinna/raisin bread...forgot the raisins...now baking curry...figured I'd ...
http://twitpic.com/u8so - current pic...and still coming down like crazy...and yes, I did make it into the hot tub! LOL
uh, no....there will be NO pics of hot tub & champagne! LOL
http://twitpic.com/u84w - 12:09 & still falling....time 4 hot tub & champagne!
http://twitpic.com/u7sr - 1/2 hour later it looks like this....stay tuned for further updates to snow conditions
http://twitpic.com/u7j2 - OMG...where have I been @fsinfo thx 2 u just discovered TwitPic....here's current snow...stay tuned 4 updates
starting to come down....getting heavier and heavier...will be taking pics every 1/2 hour....
waiting anxiously 4 snow...want to send @jwagner some pics!
woohoo!!! SNOW DAY.....but I'm hanging in a big chair w/ Acer on lap overlookinng the lake...and STILL NO SNOW!!! what gives????
OMG Just located the 'insert symbol' drop-down menu on TwitterGadget !!! LOL WHERE has my brain been???
so Jing has come out w/ a Pro version ~$15/yr.....will YOU upgrade?
Better go take my EdTech 365/2009 pic. My peeps in group are making me rise 2 challenge
had a 2 hour delay....I could get really used to this!
Thinking of using Pennies, but waiting to hear from my Tweets....TIA
POLL: looking for a SIMPLE spending tracking app for the iTouch -- just want to list what I spend & categories and dates..suggestions?
For those who want to join a 365 Flickr group, please consider Ed Tech 365/2009 -- keep in mind that SL pics are also welcomed!
anybody else having a BAD case of 'Sunday-itis'? I NEED ANOTHER WEEK!!!!!
heading out to dinner with friends -- need to drive 1.5 hours for a chinese dinner...that's the $ you pay 4 living in the boonies!
rt @langwitches - Please help my elementary school "Go Around The World with 80 Schools" http://tinyurl.com/7xxx9x it's a worthwhile cause!
